verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Go <WH935> <WH8798> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8761>, that they may serve <WH5647> <WH8799> me.
And if thou refuse <WH3986> to let them go <WH7971> <WH8763>, behold, I will smite <WH5062> <WH8802> all thy borders <WH1366> with frogs <WH6854>:

And the river <WH2975> shall bring forth <WH8317> frogs <WH6854> abundantly <WH8317> <WH8804>, which shall go up <WH5927> <WH8804> and come <WH935> <WH8804> into thine house <WH1004>, and into thy bedchamber <WH2315> <WH4904>, and upon thy bed <WH4296>, and into the house <WH1004> of thy servants <WH5650>, and upon thy people <WH5971>, and into thine ovens <WH8574>, and into thy kneadingtroughs <WH4863>:
And the frogs <WH6854> shall come up <WH5927> <WH8799> both on thee, and upon thy people <WH5971>, and upon all thy servants <WH5650>.

And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Say <WH559> <WH8798> unto Aharon <WH175>, Stretch forth <WH5186> <WH8798> thine hand <WH3027> with thy rod <WH4294> over the streams <WH5104>, over the rivers <WH2975>, and over the ponds <WH98>, and cause frogs <WH6854> to come up <WH5927> <WH8685> upon the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And Aharon <WH175> stretched out <WH5186> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> over the waters <WH4325> of Egypt <WH4714>; and the frogs <WH6854> came up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and covered <WH3680> <WH8762> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And the magicians <WH2748> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so with their enchantments <WH3909>, and brought up <WH5927> <WH8686> frogs <WH6854> upon the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

Then Pharaoh <WH6547> called <WH7121> <WH8799> for Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Intreat <WH6279> <WH8685> the YY <WH3068>, that he may take away <WH5493> <WH8686> the frogs <WH6854> from me, and from my people <WH5971>; and I will let the people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8762>, that they may do sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, Glory <WH6286> <WH8690> over me: when <WH4970> shall I intreat <WH6279> <WH8686> for thee, and for thy servants <WH5650>, and for thy people <WH5971>, to destroy <WH3772> <WH8687> the frogs <WH6854> from thee and thy houses <WH1004>, that they may remain <WH7604> <WH8735> in the river <WH2975> only?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, To morrow <WH4279>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Be it according to thy word <WH1697>: that thou mayest know <WH3045> <WH8799> that there is none like unto the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>.

And the frogs <WH6854> shall depart <WH5493> <WH8804> from thee, and from thy houses <WH1004>, and from thy servants <WH5650>, and from thy people <WH5971>; they shall remain <WH7604> <WH8735> in the river <WH2975> only.

And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> from Pharaoh <WH6547>: and Mosheh <WH4872> cried <WH6817> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> because of <WH1697> the frogs <WH6854> which he had brought <WH7760> <WH8804> against Pharaoh <WH6547>.

And the YY <WH3068> did <WH6213> <WH8799> according to the word <WH1697> of Mosheh <WH4872>; and the frogs <WH6854> died <WH4191> <WH8799> out of the houses <WH1004>, out of the villages <WH2691>, and out of the fields <WH7704>.
And they gathered them together <WH6651> <WH8799> upon heaps <WH2563>: and the land <WH776> stank <WH887> <WH8799>.

But when Pharaoh <WH6547> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that there was respite <WH7309>, he hardened <WH3513> <WH8687> his heart <WH3820>, and hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto them; as the YY <WH3068> had said <WH1696> <WH8765>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Say <WH559> <WH8798> unto Aharon <WH175>, Stretch out <WH5186> <WH8798> thy rod <WH4294>, and smite <WH5221> <WH8685> the dust <WH6083> of the land <WH776>, that it may become lice <WH3654> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And they did <WH6213> <WH8799> so; for Aharon <WH175> stretched out <WH5186> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> with his rod <WH4294>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the dust <WH6083> of the earth <WH776>, and it became lice <WH3654> in man <WH120>, and in beast <WH929>; all the dust <WH6083> of the land <WH776> became lice <WH3654> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And the magicians <WH2748> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so with their enchantments <WH3909> to bring forth <WH3318> <WH8687> lice <WH3654>, but they could <WH3201> <WH8804> not: so there were lice <WH3654> upon man <WH120>, and upon beast <WH929>.

Then the magicians <WH2748> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, This is the finger <WH676> of 'Elohim <WH430>: and Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820> was hardened <WH2388> <WH8799>, and he hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto them; as the YY <WH3068> had said <WH1696> <WH8765>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Rise up early <WH7925> <WH8685> in the morning <WH1242>, and stand <WH3320> <WH8690> before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>; lo, he cometh forth <WH3318> <WH8802> to the water <WH4325>; and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8761>, that they may serve <WH5647> <WH8799> me.

Else, if thou wilt not let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8764>, behold, I will send <WH7971> <WH8688> swarms <WH6157> of flies upon thee, and upon thy servants <WH5650>, and upon thy people <WH5971>, and into thy houses <WH1004>: and the houses <WH1004> of the Egyptians <WH4714> shall be full <WH4390> <WH8804> of swarms <WH6157> of flies, and also the ground <WH127> whereon they are.

And I will sever <WH6395> <WH8689> in that day <WH3117> the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>, in which my people <WH5971> dwell <WH5975> <WH8802>, that no <WH1115> swarms <WH6157> of flies shall be <WH1961> <WH8800> there; to the end <WH4616> thou mayest know <WH3045> <WH8799> that I am the YY <WH3068> in the midst <WH7130> of the earth <WH776>.
And I will put <WH7760> <WH8804> a division <WH6304> between my people <WH5971> and thy people <WH5971>: to morrow <WH4279> shall this sign <WH226> be.

And the YY <WH3068> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so; and there came <WH935> <WH8799> a grievous <WH3515> swarm <WH6157> of flies into the house <WH1004> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and into his servants <WH5650> ' houses <WH1004>, and into all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: the land <WH776> was corrupted <WH7843> <WH8735> by reason <WH6440> of the swarm <WH6157> of flies.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> called <WH7121> <WH8799> for <WH413> Mosheh <WH4872> and for Aharon <WH175>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798> ye, sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8798> to your 'Elohim <WH430> in the land <WH776>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is not meet <WH3559> <WH8737> so to do <WH6213> <WH8800>; for <WH2005> we shall sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> the abomination <WH8441> of the Egyptians <WH4714> to the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>: lo, shall we sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> the abomination <WH8441> of the Egyptians <WH4714> before their eyes <WH5869>, and will they not stone <WH5619> <WH8799> us?

We will go <WH3212> <WH8799> three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ' journey <WH1870> into the wilderness <WH4057>, and sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8804> to the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, as he shall command <WH559> <WH8799> us.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will let you go <WH7971> <WH8762>, that ye may sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8804> to the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> in the wilderness <WH4057>; only ye shall not go <WH3212> <WH8800> very <WH7368> <WH8687> far away <WH7368> <WH8686>: intreat <WH6279> <WH8685> for me <WH1157>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, I go out <WH3318> <WH8802> from thee, and I will intreat <WH6279> <WH8689> the YY <WH3068> that the swarms <WH6157> of flies may depart <WH5493> <WH8804> from Pharaoh <WH6547>, from his servants <WH5650>, and from his people <WH5971>, to morrow <WH4279>: but <WH7535> let not Pharaoh <WH6547> deal deceitfully <WH2048> <WH8763> any more <WH3254> <WH8686> in not <WH1115> letting the people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8763> to sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8800> to the YY <WH3068>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> from Pharaoh <WH6547>, and intreated <WH6279> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>.

And the YY <WH3068> did <WH6213> <WH8799> according to the word <WH1697> of Mosheh <WH4872>; and he removed <WH5493> <WH8686> the swarms <WH6157> of flies from Pharaoh <WH6547>, from his servants <WH5650>, and from his people <WH5971>; there remained <WH7604> <WH8738> not one <WH259>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> hardened <WH3513> <WH8686> his heart <WH3820> at this time <WH6471> also, neither would he let the people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8765>.
